summary: This is a child exploitation/porn case update report for Lead AUSAs, listing cases coded 080 or 087. It includes status updates for the cases against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, noting Epstein's death and the withdrawal of his appeal.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a defendant in case 19-CR-00490, with notes indicating his indictment, arrest, and death by suicide.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as a defendant in case 20-CR-00330, with her indictment date noted.

persons.name: Catherine O'Hagan Wolfe
persons.context: Clerk for the US Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit who issued the mandate withdrawing Jeffrey Epstein's appeal.

connections.description: Both are listed as defendants in related child exploitation cases within the same report, indicating their legal connection in the broader investigation.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Indictment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted on federal charges.

events.title: Appeal Withdrawn
events.description: The US Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit issued a mandate withdrawing Jeffrey Epstein's appeal (19-2221) as per a stipulation by the parties.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide while in custody.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Indictment
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was indicted on federal charges.

keyFacts: The document is a system-generated case status report for child exploitation cases (codes 080/087) dated February 22, 2021.
It confirms the indictment, arrest, and death by suicide of Jeffrey Epstein in 2019.
It confirms the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell in June 2020.
It notes the withdrawal of Jeffrey Epstein's appeal (19-2221) in the Second Circuit on August 21, 2019.
The report instructs Lead AUSAs to update or close cases promptly to focus on active supervision.
